result.arabic_text: أَمَّن يَهۡدِيكُمۡ فِي ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ وَمَن يُرۡسِلُ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦٓۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ تَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
result.translation: 63.Hinnak Nabiyow A-korosuk Yallat agleytah haytaanamih qibaada tayse innaa, hinnay barrii kee baddi diteetak gita siinih yascasseeh, isi Racmatak (rob kinnuk) foocat aytikumah caacooya siinih ruuba Yalli yayseeh? Ah abeh yan Yallâ luk yaqbuden Yalli yanii? (mayan) Yalli fayya iyyeeh saytunnooweh agleh kaat hayya haanamak keenik ixxic.
